name: Career Counseling Session
description: Get personalized guidance for your career goals with one-on-one expert advice.

name: Resume Review
description: Get your resume professionally reviewed to stand out to employers.

name: Mock Interview
description: Practice with mock interviews to build confidence and improve performance.

name: Cover Letter Writing
description: Craft a compelling cover letter tailored to your desired job roles.

name: LinkedIn Profile Setup
description: Set up a professional LinkedIn profile to attract recruiters and employers.

name: Job Search Strategy
description: Learn effective job search strategies and tools to land your dream job.

name: Career Change Consultation
description: Thinking of switching careers? Get guidance on how to make a smooth transition.

name: Skill Assessment
description: Discover your strongest skills and how to apply them to the right job roles.

name: Freelancing Setup
description: Step-by-step guidance on starting your freelancing career and building your portfolio.

name: Interview Confidence Coaching
description: Boost your confidence with techniques and mock interview practice.

name: Scholarship Guidance
description: Learn how to find and apply for scholarships that suit your academic journey.

name: Portfolio Review
description: Receive expert feedback on your creative or technical portfolio to make it job-ready.
